summary: REQ-2 (Hero load-failure handling with a user-visible message and gradient fallback) appears implemented in Hero.tsx. REQ-1 (ensuring the actual hero image asset exists at the required public path) is not evidenced by the diff, and unrelated metadata/state files were modified without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the homepage Hero background image file exists in the repo at frontend/public/assets/generated/cruise-ship-hero.dim_1600x900.jpg so it is deployed and loads at /assets/generated/cruise-ship-hero.dim_1600x900.jpg.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added file under frontend/public/assets/generated/ and explicitly reports no added files; therefore there is no evidence the required image asset was added to the repo at the specified path.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project_state.json to add/track new_feature_requests (AR-1/AR-2) and other metadata changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to fix the hero asset and update Hero.tsx; it does not request changes to project tracking/state files.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt with updated descriptions (including Hero/other components).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request generating/updating file summary documentation.
